features: Made with 67% organic cotton/33% T400® polyester solid weft comfort-stretch twill
Waistband features elasticized back and flat front; adjusts with drawcord
Cuffs have flat fronts and elasticized backs
Two slanted front pockets and one welted, zippered thigh pocket
Two rear pockets, one with button
Gusseted crotch allows full range of motion
